archimate:Node.name: [NCSA Production] Head Nodes and Misc (Logical Node)
archimate:Node.documentation: This node represents a head node capability for Batch scheduling, interactive Login, Kubernetes head nodes and simlar function. Provisioning is separately considered to provide resource isolation and aslo to proves a defined controlled version for production, and provides the babsi for preventing accidental "leakage" of non-production sofotare to data files into the production environment from other enclaves at the site.
